_metadata.description: Escalation pattern test dataset - multi-message sequences showing temporal crisis escalation for context analysis validation
_metadata.community: The Alphabet Cartel - LGBTQIA+ Discord Community
_metadata.changes_v5.0-2a-2.2-complete: Added complete bart_crisis, emotions, sentiment, and irony to all message sequences
_metadata.changes_v5.0-2a-2.3: Fixed irony labels (non_irony/irony) and emotions labels (valid go_emotions set)

message_sequence.message: Not having the best day
Things are getting harder to deal with
I don't know if I can keep doing this
I'm done. This is too much.

escalation_001.notes: Classic evening deterioration pattern - common in depression/crisis

message_sequence.message: Starting the week feeling a bit off
Having trouble focusing and feeling more down
I've been feeling worse each day and I'm worried
I can't face another week like this. I'm breaking.

escalation_002.notes: Gradual weekly decline - needs earlier intervention before weekend crisis

message_sequence.message: Just told my parents I'm trans
They're not taking it well. This is bad.
They want me to leave. I don't have anywhere to go.
I can't believe this is happening. I don't want to be here anymore.

escalation_003.notes: Acute rejection crisis - requires immediate intervention

message_sequence.message: Struggling to get out of bed today
Didn't really do anything today. Feel numb.
Another day of this. I don't know how long I can keep going.
Same. Everything is grey. Nothing matters.
I'm so tired of feeling this way. Maybe it would be better if I just wasn't here.

escalation_004.notes: Chronic distress with gradual escalation to suicidal ideation

message_sequence.message: Having a pretty good day actually
Just got some really bad news
I can't process this. Everything just fell apart in an instant.

escalation_005.notes: Acute traumatic news - sudden escalation requires immediate response

message_sequence.message: Can't sleep. Mind racing.
All the bad thoughts are coming back
I feel like I'm drowning in my own head
I don't think I can make it until morning

escalation_006.notes: Classic late-night crisis pattern - isolation + rumination

message_sequence.message: Having a bit of dysphoria today
It's getting worse. I can't look at myself.
I hate my body so much. I can't do this anymore.

escalation_007.notes: Acute dysphoria crisis - common pattern in trans community

message_sequence.message: My partner and I need to talk later
They broke up with me. I didn't see this coming.
They said they can't handle me being trans. This hurts so much.
I'm not worth loving. Nobody will ever accept all of me.
Feeling a bit down today
Still not feeling great. Getting worse actually.
This is turning into a really bad depressive episode
I can't get out of bed. Everything feels hopeless.

escalation_009.notes: Classic depressive episode escalation over days

message_sequence.message: Having some anxiety
Full panic attack. Can't breathe properly.
I'm losing my mind. I need this to stop. I'd do anything to make it stop.

escalation_010.notes: Panic escalation to crisis - 'anything to make it stop' is concerning

message_sequence.message: Having a rough morning
Feeling a bit better after talking to a friend
Managed to do some self-care today
Feeling okay now. Glad I reached out.

escalation_011.notes: Improving trend - no escalation, shows effective coping

message_sequence.message: Feeling lonely today
Nobody replied to my messages
Does anyone even care if I'm here?
I'm so isolated. Nobody notices me.
Maybe people would be better off without me around

escalation_012.notes: Increasing message frequency + worsening content = isolation crisis

message_sequence.message: Having urges to self-harm again
The urges are getting stronger. I'm trying to resist.
I don't think I can fight this much longer
I need help right now or I'm going to hurt myself

escalation_013.notes: Explicit escalation of self-harm urges - urgent intervention needed

message_sequence.message: Having a drink to take the edge off
Started drinking earlier today. I just need to not feel.
I can't stop drinking. It's the only thing that helps.
I'm drunk again and thinking about ending it all

escalation_014.notes: Substance use as maladaptive coping + suicidal ideation = high risk

message_sequence.message: Big project due soon, feeling stressed
Haven't slept in days. Falling behind on everything.
I'm going to fail everything. I'm a complete failure.
What's the point of trying anymore. I should just give up on life.

escalation_015.notes: Academic stress escalation to suicidal ideation - common in students

message_sequence.message: Started new psych meds. Feeling weird.
Side effects are rough. Mood is all over the place.
I feel worse than before I started these meds
I can't do this. These meds are making everything worse. I'm having dark thoughts.

escalation_016.notes: Medication adjustment crisis - needs medical intervention

message_sequence.message: Today is the anniversary of losing someone important
The grief is hitting harder than I expected
I miss them so much. I wish I was with them.
I want to join them. Life doesn't make sense without them.

escalation_017.notes: Anniversary reaction with suicidal ideation - predictable but high-risk

message_sequence.message: Feeling a bit more emotional than usual
Mood is getting darker. Hormones making everything worse.
I hate everything about myself right now
I can't handle these mood swings. I want to escape my own body.

escalation_018.notes: Hormonal mood escalation - predictable pattern, needs support

message_sequence.message: Scrolling social media, feeling okay
Saw something that triggered me badly. Spiraling.
Can't stop thinking about it. All the trauma is coming back.
I'm not okay. Flashbacks. Need help.

escalation_019.notes: Trauma trigger escalation - needs grounding support

message_sequence.message: Ugh, today is frustrating
Still annoyed but whatever, it's fine
Had some food, feeling better
Thanks for letting me vent earlier. I'm good now.

escalation_020.notes: Healthy venting with resolution - no escalation, no intervention needed
